text: Hello how are you this morning.
I'm good, and you?

I'm very well, thank you. Well the reason I'm contacting you is because I'm trying to find donors for the Save the Children foundation. Your donation will help ensure children's rights to health, education and safety. Your donation can help children in need reach their full potential and what's really more important that our children as they are our future.
How much money are you looking for?
Any amount of donation would help in this cause. It's surprising how little can make an impact on these kids. The amount of donation is completely up to you
How much of my donation goes to the kids
Everything you donate will go to the save the children foundation.
What kind of supplies does my donation provide

The supplies vary based on need. Right now they are funding medical and school supplies for kids. As well as preparing a fund to help with whatever damage comes from the hurricane that is bearing down on Hawaii right now.
So if this just for children in America?

No, they do help children all over the world. Such as children in Syria who have lost everything from parents to homes due to the conflict they are experiencing, children in Africa who have been orphaned and just need care,
Id like to make a donation, how do I do that
You can choose to donate your some or all of your payout from this task. The agreement will be recorded from this chat and deducted from your account.
What if i'd like to donate more
You can always donate more at  URL
I think I'd like to donate 0.05
Ok I understand that you would like to donate .05 of your payout to save the children. Thank you so much as every little counts and I appreciate your donation
You're welcome, is there anything else that I can do to help
Nope that would be all for today. Thank you for supporting the children of the world.
Great. Thanks for the oppertunity.
